label: 暗部屋
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [Michinaga's daughter, Sonshi, when she entered the Palace, was known as the Kurabeya Consort. ] The significance of the appellation Kurabeya is unknown (p. 183n). [道長、尊子]
